pages.text: 26|3|Kare-ra ga shinja ni narou to shinai tame, anata wa tabun, shinuhodo kunō shite iru kotodearou.
26|4|Moshi ware ga sono tsumori to nari, ten kara shirushi o kudaseba, kare-ra wa sore ni osoreitte kenkyo ni narudearou.
26|5|Daga, jihibukaki okata kara kare-ra ni atarashī kunkai ga motarasa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa itsumo somuki saru.
26|6|Kare-ra wa (sore o) usodearu to suru.Daga ima ni sono gurō suru koto ga, shinjitsu to natte, kare-ra ni furikakaru nodearu.
26|7|Kare-ra wa, ka no daichi o minai no ka. Ikaga ni ōku no, subete no tōtoi mono o, ware wa soko de sodateru ka o.
26|8|Hontōni sono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|9|Hontōni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okatadearu.
26|10|Anata no omo ga mūsā ni yobikake, kō ōse rareta toki o omoi nasai. `Fuhōna min no moto ni ike.
26|11|Firuaun no min no moto ni. Kare-ra wa omo o osorenai no ka.'
26|12|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Watashi no omo yo, kare-ra ga watashi o uso-tsuki yobawari suru koto o osore ma su.
26|13|Watashi no mune wa appaku sa re, mata watashi no shita wa motsuremasu. Desukara hārūn o, noko washi (tasuke)te kudasai.
26|14|Mata (sono Jō) kare-ra wa, watashi ni tsumi o ka shite irunode, watashi o korosu no o osoremasu.'
26|15|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Kesshite sōde wanai. Anata gata ryōnin wa, waga shirushi o motte ike. Hontōni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni ite, kiite iru nodearu.
26|16|Sorede anata gata ryōnin wa, firuaun no moto ni itte itte yaru ga ī. “Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yū no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shitodearukara,
26|17|Isuraeru no shison o, watashi-tachi to issho ni ika sete kudasai” to.'
26|18|Kare wa itta. `Anata wa yōshō no toki, watashi-tachi no ma de sodate raretade wanai ka. Anata no shōgai no ōku no nengetsu o, watashi-tachi no ma de sugoshitade wanai ka.
26|19|Sorenanoni anata wa hidoi koto o shidekashita monoda. Anata wa onwowasureru-sha no nakamadearu.'
